name: Class Escapade
description:
Adventure click-and-point made in 2 weeks for $105 Adventure Game Jam 2021!

Play as a student trying to escape a super high-tech school.

But there's a catch! You have a strict schedule to keep up with to avoid suspicion and getting yourself into detention.  Explore the school, talk with classmates, and do well and class and you just might find yourself out of this hell.

Good luck! You'll probably need it.

Features:

- STRESS STRESS STRESS of being in school! :D

- Several Endings 

 - Possibly dramatic CGs

- Over 5 rooms to fully investigate and stare at

- Some edgy original music tracks made for this game

- Painstakingly hand-drawn characters and  animations to entertain your bored eyes during the long, somewhat lengthy dialogue 

- 4+ characters to attach your heart-strings and feels to (hopefully)

- One best friend (sorta) to help you through this difficult and dangerous journey 

==============================================================================================================================

For anyone who's still reading this:

Thanks. That means quite a bit. Two completely fresh-out-of-the-water gamedev noobs died in the making of this over the two week grind. This is literally our first finished game (that one april fools thing doesnt count). So if there's some stuff/parts that buggy or the art looks trash in areas (i know you're being triggered over those ever-so-janky sprites), please bear with us; seriously, the crunch was real. We suggest you play it more than once-- there's quite a bit of *ahem* eggs sprinkled around the game.   Feel free to let us know of any bugs--we'll try to fix them at some point.

And if you liked it, let us know! Or roast us, I guess.  A comment or review's more than enough. Either way, we hope this game was enjoyable --or at the very least, educational lol-- in some way for you. 

If anyone really, really loved it-- please consider donating to our ko-fi. 

https://ko-fi.com/kapiko

It'll make our day.

==============================================================================================================================

We'll be sleeping for the next two weeks to make up for the lost rest during the making of this game or whatever thingy.
